paper_abstract: In this paper we present a rule-based system by using interval type-2 fuzzy sets (IT2-FS) for solving problems of spatial analysis. This system is encapsulated in a Geographical Information System (GIS) by performing numerous tests for evaluating their reliability. (C) 2014 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Type-2 interval fuzzy rule-based systems in spatial analysis
